title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 72 - Indemnification Of Directors And Officers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 72

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201,301, art. 23; Business Corporation Law, § 727; Not-for-Profit Corporation Law, § 727; Banking Law, § 7024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
